title: STERN – v1.4.2
body:
STERN – v1.4.2


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Run and gun, Side, 2D
Company: Tlylaxu
Languages: RUS/ENG
Original Size: 3.5 GB
Repack Size: 2.3 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on STERN-DARKSiDERS ISO release: ds-stern.iso (3,779,170,304 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.5 to 2.3 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-3 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 3.6 GB
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • To force the game into either English or Russian language add this parameter in desktop icon’s properties field: -culture=en or -culture=ru

Game Description

Anarchy and lawlessness flourish in the city, and at the same time, due to the explosion of a chemical plant, all residents inhabiting the city are turning into unknown creatures and creatures that crave human flesh.

No more rules, no more laws!

Game Features

  • EXPLORE: The very world is at your fingertips as you fight for survival, fortune, and glory!
  • BOSSES: Kill dangerous creatures to get a unique loot!
  • PROGRESS: Сhoose to seek out ever-greater foe’s to test your mettle in combat!
  • FISHING: Catch many different types of creatures, and complete tasks from the robot fisherman!
  • CURSE: Go through random events, and get rewarded!
  • COMMUNICATE: Talk to the survivors, and learn the history of this world!
  • YOUR DRONE: Manage your drone! [Monitor its – name | health | energy | level | experience | modules | items]
  • BUFFS/DEBUFFS: Turning into an animal, blindness, infection, drunkenness, and more!
  • COMBAT: Find unique creatures to fight and capture unique loot, effects and progression!
  • CRAFT: Create a variety of different items and weapons!
  • DEPTHS: Get down deep into cavernous expanses in search of treasure! Let’s go, traveler!
  • HUGE ARSENAL: From a homing rocket launcher to a cannon that turns enemies into pigs!
